name: Hentai Girl Fantasy
description:
Hentai Girl Fantasy is a puzzle game, in which all you need is to swop bricks, in order to make the pictures restored.
But please remember, this game is aiming to make you relax and enjoy life.
So if you cannot get relaxed, you may try “Administrator Mode”.

Administrator Mode

Keyboard F: Complete Level

Game Features

  • artworks
  • 100 achievements
  • Relaxing music
